text: Ej mu'minon, cun sumo ʙa nazdason ʙozgarded, (ʙaroi naraftanason ʙa cihod) meojandu uzr mepursand. Bigu: «Uzr mapursed, guftoratonro hargiz ʙovar nadorem, ki Alloh moro az axʙori sumo ogoh kardaast. Ba zudi Allohu pajomʙaras amali sumoro dar dunjo xohand did. Ojo sumo az nifoqi xud tavʙa mekuned jo ʙar on pojdor meisted? On goh sumoro nazdi on Allohe, ki donoi nihonu oskor ast, meʙarand, to az naticai a'molaton ogohaton sozad!»
